question: What is one key feature that distinguishes a Reflexion agent from a basic reflection agent?
options: It uses a static set of rules to critique AI outputs.
It generates self-critiques but does not integrate external data or tools.
It completes all processing in a single iteration to maximize speed and efficiency.
It incorporates external tools to retrieve real-time information and supports outputs with citations.
correct_answer: It incorporates external tools to retrieve real-time information and supports outputs with citations.
explanation: A Reflexion agent is distinguished by its ability to integrate external tools for real-time information retrieval and provide outputs with citations, enhancing its functionality beyond basic reflection.
